short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate words and add them to your dictionary

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Absolutely, here's a simplified version:

Introducing our new Chrome extension that makes translating words while browsing the web super easy!

Here's what it does:

Set Up: First, just give the extension permission to work. It's a one-time thing.

Translate on the Go: Whenever you're on a website, highlight any word you want to translate and keep mouse down. Our extension will quickly give you the meaning, considering how the word is used in that sentence.

See Instant Results: You'll see the translation right there on the screen, so you can keep reading without interruption.

Easy to Use: It's really simple to use and fits right into your browsing routine.

Learn as You Go: Plus, every word you translate gets saved for later on choodic.com. It's like building your own vocabulary list without even trying!

Get our Chrome extension now and make browsing in different languages a breeze!
